testcase.classname: Find all tag groups related to organizer id
testcase.name: Find all tag groups with non existing organizer
testcase.system-out: Given user creates request body for listing all tag groups..................passed When user sends post request for listing tag groups with non existing organizer.passed Then user validates organizer not found error for listing tag groups........passed And user verifies http status code "404" for non existing organizer.........passed

testcase.classname: Find all tag groups related to organizer id
testcase.name: Find all tag groups when archived_at column is not null on core_tag_group table
testcase.system-out: Given user creates request body for checking archived groups................passed When user send post request to list all tag groups..........................passed Then user validates all tag group those not archived........................passed And user validates all tag groups those archived............................passed And user verifies http status code "200"....................................passed
